faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to your questions. Our team is here to support you in your success.

items.question: How does it work exactly?
items.answer: You sign up in 2 minutes, automatically connect your WhatsApp and Telegram bots, add your customers and send your first campaigns instantly. Everything is guided and our support helps you if needed.

items.question: Do my customers need to install anything?
items.answer: No! Your customers receive your messages directly on WhatsApp and Telegram that they already use. No app to download, no additional registration required.

items.question: Is it complicated to set up?
items.answer: Not at all! Our interface is designed to be simple. One-click bot setup, adding customers by import or manually, creating campaigns in a few clicks. If you know how to send an SMS, you know how to use Bizuri.

items.question: Can I really send to all my customers at once?
items.answer: Yes! Once your customers are registered, you create your promotion/event and send it instantly to your entire list via WhatsApp and Telegram. In 30 seconds, all your customers are informed.

items.question: How much does it really cost?
items.answer: Freemium $14/month (150 customers), Premium $25/month (400 customers), VIP $99/month (1000+ customers). No hidden fees, no commitment. Cancel anytime, keep your data.

items.question: Is my customer data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely! SSL encryption, secure servers, GDPR compliance. Your data belongs to you, we never share it. You can export and delete your data at any time.

items.question: What if it doesn't work for my business?
items.answer: Our solution works for all types of businesses: supermarkets, shops, pharmacies, restaurants... Over 500 businesses trust us. Our support helps you adapt Bizuri to your specific needs.

items.question: Is there support and training?
items.answer: Yes! Free training included, complete documentation in French, chat support (Premium) or email. Our French-speaking team based in Africa understands your challenges and helps you succeed.
